Package BattleShip

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BattleGround
    Battle Ground: Consisted of two grids, the upper coner grid is player's grid, with the ship player deployed.
    BattleShip
    Battle ship: where length is 4, width is 1 Load the picture of vertical and horizontal
    Carrier
    Carrier: where length is 5, width is 1 Load the picture of vertical and horizontal
    Cruiser
    Cruiser ship: where length is 4, width is 1 Load the picture of vertical and horizontal
    DataParser
    DataParser: read Image and decode the information send by another end
    DataWrapper
    DataWrapper: encode the data to a particular string or int
    Deployment
    Deployment stage: Enable deploy the ship to the grid
    Destroyer
    Destroyer ship: where length is 2, width is 1 Load the picture of vertical and horizontal
    EndSys
    Abstract function of system.
    GameClient
    Client side of the game, if enter DNS Multithreading, run with the panels at the same time
    GameServer
    Server side of the game, Multithreading, run with the panels at the same time
    Grid
    Grid record the ships and the fires
    Login
    Login in page, allow user to create room or add a room of specific dns
    MainFrame
    Main Frame, add or remove component for represent stages
    Setting
    Setting panel, for set grid size and timer
    Ship
    Represent the ship in the grid
    Submarine
    Submarine: where length is 3, width is 1 Load the picture of vertical and horizontal
